Address.value: 2700 HOMESTEAD ROAD,SUITE 50 SUITE 110-502, PARK CITY, Utah, 84098, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Prairie Operating Co., formerly Creek Road Miners, Inc., is engaged in developing energy. The Company's undeveloped oil and gas leasehold acreage is located in Weld County, Colorado (the Exok Assets). The Company also has the option to purchase approximately 32,695.63 additional gross Weld County acres.
